pages.text: Certain machines have outputs that have a chance to appear, especially when catalysts are used. Take, for example, a recipe where 2.5 of an output item are generated per input item. While the first two output items are guaranteed, the third is left up to a 50% chance. This can cause issues when the machine's output slot(s) fill.
Thermal Expansion handles this by simply letting the stack size increase at will to accomodate these excess outputs.
pages.title: This is not a bug!
